開始タグ: (かいしタグ) - beginning tag; starting tag; opening tag
開始変数: (かいしへんすう) - starting variable; SV
開学: (かいがく) - establishment of a university
開宴: (かいえん) - opening of a banquet; opening of a wedding reception
開封: (kaifuu) - abrir (um envelope ou pacote), quebrar o selo, carta aberta
開局: (かいきょく) - opening of post-office or telephone exchange
開山: (かいさん) - founding a temple (on a hill-top)
開山堂: (かいさんどう) - temple hall commemorating its founding or its founder
開巻: (かいかん) - opening (part) of a book
開巻劈頭: (かいかんへきとう) - (yoji) at the very beginning of a book; The book opens with ...
開巻第一: (かいかんだいいち) - (yoji) at the very beginning of a book; The book opens with ...
開帳: (かいちょう) - unveiling a Buddhist image; gambling; revealing something that is supposed to remain hidden
開幕: (kaimaku) - levantando o pano; abertura (de um evento), início de uma temporada
開幕戦: (かいまくせん) - opening game; (season) opener
開平: (かいへい) - extraction of square root
開庁: (かいちょう) - governmental office opening (usually special case)
開店休業: (かいてんきゅうぎょう) - open, but transacting no business at all
開店時間: (かいてんじかん) - opening hours (of a store, restaurant, etc.)
開廊時間: (かいろうじかん) - opening hours of a gallery
開式: (かいしき) - opening of a ceremony
開成所: (かいせいじょ) - Kaiseijo (school of foreign studies set up by the shogunate during the Edo period)
開戦: (かいせん) - outbreak of war; starting a war
開所: (かいしょ) - open a new business
開拓: (kaitaku) - reclamation (ex.: terreno baldio), cultivation, development; pioneering, opening up (e.g. new market), breaking new ground, trailblazing
開拓使: (かいたくし) - early-Meiji administrative unit for Hokkaido (1869-1882)
開拓地: (かいたくち) - reclaimed land; cleared land; area opened for development
開拓精神: (かいたくせいしん) - frontier spirit
開拓者: (かいたくしゃ) - pioneer; settler; colonist
開拓者精神: (かいたくしゃせいしん) - pioneering spirit
開放: (かいほう) - open; throw open; liberalization; liberalisation
開放型システム: (かいほうがたシステム) - open system
開放型システム間相互接続: (かいほうがたシステムかんそうごせつぞく) - Open Systems Interconnection; OSI
開放型システム間相互接続環境: (かいほうがたシステムかんそうごせつぞくかんきょう) - open systems interconnection environment
開放型文書体系: (かいほうがたぶんしょたいけい) - Open Document Architecture; ODA
開放性結核: (かいほうせいけっかく) - open tuberculosis
開放感: (かいほうかん) - sense of space; spaciousness
開放的: (かいほうてき) - open; frank; liberal; open-minded
開放経済: (かいほうけいざい) - an open economy
開放血管系: (かいほうけっかんけい) - open blood-vascular system
開放骨折: (かいほうこっせつ) - open fracture
開教師: (かいきょうし) - Buddhist missionary, esp. in Jodo, Pure Land, etc. sects; Buddhist minister (in the West)
開方: (かいほう) - extraction of roots; evolution
開札: (かいさつ) - opening or unsealing of bids
開板: (かいはん) - publishing (esp. using woodblock printing)
開枕: (かいちん) - bringing out the pillows and futon (in Zen Buddhism); sleeping
開架: (かいか) - open access (in a library); open shelves
開架式: (かいかしき) - making materials in a library available in open stacks
開栓: (かいせん) - (ant: 閉栓) unstopping/uncorking/uncapping/opening; connecting (e.g. gas supply)
開校式: (かいこうしき) - school opening ceremony
開校記念日: (かいこうきねんび) - anniversary of the founding of the school
開梱: (かいこん) - open (as of a pack)
開業: (かいぎょう) - opening a business; opening a practice
開業を許す: (かいぎょうをゆるす) - to be licensed to practice (e.g. law); to be allowed to open a business
開業医: (かいぎょうい) - private clinician; physician in private practice; general practitioner
開法: (かいほう) - extraction of roots; evolution
開浴: (かいよく) - bathing (in a Zen Temple)
開渠: (かいきょ) - open ditch; open channel; open conduit; open culvert
開港: (かいこう) - opening a port (seaport, airport, etc.)/starting operations at a port; opening a port to foreign vessels or trade
開湯: (かいとう) - opening of a hot spring or bath house
開演: (かいえん) - curtain raising; starting (e.g. play, concert)
開炉: (かいろ) - first lighting of the hearth in a Zen temple (first day of the 10th or 11th month)
開版: (かいはん) - publishing (esp. using woodblock printing)
開発グループ: (かいはつグループ) - development group
開発コード: (かいはつコード) - code name (of a product under development)
開発コード名: (かいはつコードめい) - code name (of a product under development)
開発プロセス: (かいはつプロセス) - development process
開発元: (かいはつもと) - developer; (software) development agency
開発基本線: (かいはつきほんせん) - developmental baseline
開発後評価: (かいはつごひょうか) - system follow-up; post-implementation review; post-development review
開発拠点: (かいはつきょてん) - development block; development base
開発環境: (かいはつかんきょう) - development environment
開発経緯: (かいはつけいい) - features (e.g. of a product); development chronology
開発能力: (かいはつのうりょく) - development capability
開発計画: (かいはつけいかく) - development project (program, programme, plan)
開発輸入: (かいはつゆにゅう) - develop-and-import formula
